ygData.msgSnippet: ... NOT just Everquest either. I flunked out of school the first time through because of PernMUSH -- and other online games, mostly Pern- based. Those didn t
ygData.messageBody:
>Quite seriously I wouldn't be surprised at all to find that EQ was the
>reason that a lot of students had flunked out of school. EQ is a drug and

NOT just Everquest either. I flunked out of school the first time
through because of PernMUSH -- and other online games, mostly Pern-
based. Those didn't even have levels. It was entirely social. Talk
to each other. Play a character, etc.

Yarra, rider of blue Jidranth, Igen/Benden Weyr, PernMUSH
Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara, level 13 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
